items.text: overpitched on middle stump, and he opens the bat's face to drive to wide long off
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full outside leg stump, and lifted to wide long off. They manage to come back for a second run, and that ensures Mushfiqur stays on strike
items.shortText: de Silva to Mustafizur Rahman, 2 runs

items.preText: Final over for Malinga. Mushfiqur's reached his 100, can Malinga get his five-for?
items.text: full on off stump, and firmly driven with the straight bat. Stopped by Malinga on his followthrough
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: low full toss on leg stump, and he uses his wrists to whip this to midwicket's right
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he swings through the line, past Mustafizur to the fielder at long on. Limps through the last run
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slower ball on leg stump, and Rubel tucks this around the corner to the vacant square-leg region
items.shortText: Malinga to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.preText: Rasel: "Ashraful should replace Tamim.... " -- ah yes, he's back after a lengthy ban and is available for selection. Unlikely that he will though
items.text: good length outside off, and he's deceived by the slower delivery. Tries to play the late cut but misses the shot completely
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: yorker on leg stump, and nudged to deep midwicket to take a single. Ensures he gets a strike
items.postText: Good sportsmanship in the field: Mushfiqur pats Malinga's back after the veteran's impressive spell of 4 for 23
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, and the cut goes in front of square. Fumbled at cover
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: low full toss on middle stump, and he mistimes a cover drive for a single
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.preText: Aruna Caldera: "Malinga, 23/4 in Ten overs without conceding a boundary in a flat pitch, hats off to you, How many matches this guy could have won is he was selected earlier"
items.text: low full toss on leg stump, and Mushi makes some room on the leg side, but can't put the ball away. Mistimes a shot down the ground to long intsead
items.postText: eddie: "Can someone please tell me as to why so many keep recommending Ashraful for an international return? He's 34 and has no better numbers than any other young up and coming batsman. Fans are simply revelling in the nostalgia of him playing 1 or 2 good innings against big teams from 13-15 years ago. Time to move on." -- Nostalgia, perhaps?
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slogged! Slower ball on off stump, and he swings across the line! Not hit too well, but enough to roll into the cow-corner boundary
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mustafizur Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: chance of a run out! And Bangladesh are all out three overs before their full quota of overs. It was a full toss on off stump, and he tapped it straight down the ground. Lakmal stops the ball, then the mid-off fielder sees the batsman running down the wicket, and therefore he composes himself and throws at the keeper
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mustafizur Rahman, OUT

dismissal.text: Mustafizur Rahman run out (Mendis/†MDKJ Perera) 10 (11b 1x4 0x6) SR: 90.90

items.preText: Unbelievable scenes! Tamim Iqbal has walked in at No. 11 and is batting with only one hand! Crazy scenes. This is remarkable bravery from Tamim Iqbal.
items.text: short on leg stump, and fended off the back foot by Tamim. He's only using the top hand to play the shot
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: overpitched outside off, and drilled to cover
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, and Mushi goes down on one knee, and then thulps a shot over the bowler's head! Long off tries to intercept, but he just can't cut it off
items.postText:
Dip: "Now I am seeing the biggest example of dedication"

Naman: "Ohh Bhai, this is saluting stuff. Tamin Iqbal you are great!"
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: full outside off stump, and Mushfiqur swings across the line. Goes to long on, on the bounce
items.postText:
Abu talha Mir: "Tamim is walking into ground with bat ....am I dreaming ??"

Ataur Rahman: "Whoever said BD players don't have "intent"....look at TAMIM IQBAL "
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: improvised! Full on off, but Mushfiqur opens his stance, sticks his bat under the ball, and then ramps this right over the head of the keeper. Intelligent cricket
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: wide outside off stump, and that's been pulled over the fielder at midwicket! Picks the screws off this delivery, and what a classy way to get to your highest ODI score!
items.postText:
Sajibul: "OMG TAMIM! I love you, man! I literally have tears seeing his incredible courage."

DJ: "If Mushfiqur gets out now, will it count as Tamim carrying his bat?"
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: full just outside off stump, and steered to point for a single. Mushi keeps strike.
items.postText:
Adley: "Now all runs should be credited into Tamim's account.. what a player"

Akshat : "Hats off Tamim! Respect! Reminds me of Kumble playing with a broken jaw!"
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and he lifts it inside-out over the fielder at cover! Lands just inside the boundary. The key to that shot was the fact that he kept his eyes on the ball at all times
items.postText:
wajahat: "Valuable runs for BD. MUSH holds key for BD success. He always stood and fought like a galdiator. Salute to you little beauty."

MahneelMusa: "Goosebumps for 16 crore, Tamim Iqbal Khan, you have no idea what you just did."

Shreeyan : "I was hating Bangladeshi player..but today TAMIM you proved me wrong.. respect from bottom of my heart.."
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.preText:
Hadi: "And Mushi fully utilizing his buddy's extreme courage. "

Rushdi: "This is heart, this is courage, this is true patriotism! Hats off to Tamim, and I would trade places just to bring glory to my country."
items.text: ramped over short fine leg! But this one won't go to the boundary. Length ball on off stump, and Mushfiqur shuffled across to the off-side early in a bid to try and play it fine past the leg side
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slower ball full on off, and he opens his bat's face to swing across the line. Mistimed to midwicket
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, and Mushfiqur's attempted slog comes off the bat's toe end
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball angling into his body, and he swings across the line to pull to deep midwicket. Refuses the single, though
items.shortText: Shanaka to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
